Designed to be the perfect knife for all of your cutting needs, the CRKT Hammond Desert Cruiser Folding Knife is made using incredibly durable materials and construction that will keep you slicing and cutting for years to come.

Knife Type: Folding Blade

Most Recent Reviews great knife but larger than expected by Jon, October 27, 2016
My title states is all: this knife is solidly built and not too heavy, but it is definitely larger than I expected. I have a Kershaw Cryo and Leek that I love but was looking for something with a little larger blade and not much more weight, and I th...

Most Recent Reviews CRKT Hammond Desert Cruiser Folding Knife by Hunter65, September 17, 2016
Incredible deal for $15.00...I left my favorite knife at a camp site on the Middle Fork of the Salmon River, so I started shopping for a new one. I found the CRKT Hammond Desert Cruiser Folding Knife on sale with free shipping for orders over $49.00 ...
Read More...
Most Recent Reviews Great knife by CA1EB1991, November 17, 2015
This a great knife for the price. I would buy this knife for full price but with optics planet I got a great deal. The added bonus of an extra clip on the side and the ability to change the clip from right to left handed carry is very beneficial. Com...
Read More...
Most Recent Reviews Knife point. by preacher, September 22, 2015
I find the knife just a little to big for normal concealed pocket carry even though I do carry it for that. I cut my finger reaching down to get the knife from my pocket because the point had cleared the case during normal daily activities. It is a ...
Read More...
Most Recent Reviews crkt hammond desert cruiser foulding knife by chris, July 11, 2015
This is a pretty good knife for the price. I already cut myself. This is a sharp knife. I would by it again! The knife is a little big so you have to get use to it. I like a big knife it was just what I was looking for.
